answers.answer: I made on from RoadID (road ID, no spaces) *******.  I put my allergies and contact info on it.   I like it.Its really not for that, but I used it for that, anyway.
I am really behind the times when it comes to teen fashion, but, I would say maybe one that has little flowers on it such as daisies.

question: Hi all! Happy 4th of July!I have a MedicAlert bracelet and I made a beaded bracelet for it instead of the yukky steel one that it came with.  I am making lots of different ones to go with different outfits.My optometrist asked me to make her grand daughter a bracelet, as she has diabetes and wears one too.Thing is, she is only 12 years old and I have no idea what 12 year old fashions are nowadays. My own daughter is now 21! I don't know any young girls. (only dumb teenage boys! LOL!)Has anyone got any ideas? I was thinking of making a couple for her to choose from and if she doesn't like one I will undo it and re-use the beads.Thanks!
title: Need some ideas
